string.name: my_notes_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'My Notes'screen where the user can see the list of notes that have been added.

string.name: my_reminders_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'My Reminders'screen where the user can see the list of reminders that have been added.

resources.string: You Have No Favorite Notes Added
